name: AMomentForTeachers
0:
”Alexa, open Teacher Time”
”Alexa, start Teacher Time”
”Alexa, launch Teacher Time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teacher time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Teachers are our most valuable resource! This skill was created to help teachers feel more inspired, confident, and peaceful in the classroom. The activities can be done alone or with students, quickly and with lasting impact. 

This skill will give you a creative, confidence-boosting, stress-releasing, or peace-promoting idea every time you open it. Just say, "Alexa, open A Moment for Teachers!"

You’ll find yourself gaining more presence, patience, confidence and becoming much happier if you do this regularly. The energy in your classroom will positively change, and your students are sure to notice too. Using this skill could become a wonderful little daily ritual.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
